1691760.name: Survival Escape Room
1691760.description:
Welcome to Survival Escape Room,

You've been kidnapped and you only have so much time to escape. Keep in mind there is only one exit. Use your light up headband to see more clearly in the dark. Watch out, there's monsters lurking nearby.


Controls:

W,A,S,D to move
Space Bar to jump
F to use light up headband


New escape rooms will be released in every update.

Good luck!
1691760.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
